stories.text: The most important thing is security in such matters. The absence of third parties in payment transactions and the exclusion of the possibility of any kind of fraud - that's what you should look for in a casino. Not everywhere online sites adhere to such. In wooricasino (https://www.casinoktx.com) there is such a feature and it is possible to deposit through terminals, and this is already receiving checks. The games themselves do not belong to the casino: they are created by developers in IT companies, and the casino as if rents the program and only controls the size of the bet. Manufacturers of such programs compete with each other and try to attract as many players as possible: for example, a bright design and pleasant music. And this should also be taken into account.
